title: Hewlet
author: Hewlet
content: What do you think about the whole story behind the death of our popular singer, mohbad? I feel with the numerous videos coming up lately, dude really went through a whole lot of physical and emotional trauma before his demise.In a country were proper investigation Is taken seriously, the root course of his death should have started coming out by now, but you know this is Nigeria, everything just comes and goes away with time. It's a shame.

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: Hewlet on September 16, 2023, 10:38:19 PMWhat do you think about the whole story behind the death of our popular singer, mohbad? Everything comes back to the Nigerian music industry, wetin dey happen there no be here because anybody wey love music like myself know say no be today wey dis boy dun dey cry out say him label boss dey abuse am and they threaten him life but nobi only the lebel boss wey him dun accused if this thing but the lebel boss own na wetin we know pass. E get when him accuse him wife too say if him died make we hold her as she dey after him life. He also accuse him label mates dem (zino and the rest) say dem set am up and want make him die. The guys life has had one controversy after another and if you ask me I go say the guy was going through serious depression becus e no just make sense say na only you everybody dey against when be say no be you be the best self for the label wey you dey. Him death dey very suspicious because nobody know why him go meet the nurse wey inject am as the news report say na after the injection wey him die and I hear say na the nurse wey call am make him come take the injection. Ear infection no dey just kill person like dat na (d whole story no just clear). Why dem just rush do burial, his father needs to be questioned because wu knows if dem dun pay am to close mouth to do the burial as dem need his permission. Police need to invite everybody wey dey involved for the mata from Naira marley to the father so dem go investigate the matter well even if na to dig am up do autopsy.Quote from: Hewlet on September 16, 2023, 10:38:19 PMIn a country were proper investigation Is taken seriously, the root course of his death should have started coming out by now, but you know this is Nigeria, everything just comes and goes away with time. It's a shame.No do oh, Nigeria police dey work at times oh especially when you pay dem well and dem bring out mind to work for you but we know say people wey know people in high places are involved in this case so no expect much from the police as everybody's dey try keep their job wey dey bring dem bread as if you do anyhow like your own dey your body, dem go loyal you to the bone so no blame law enforcement officers wey dem no dey pay well self. With time sha everything go come to light but I hear say this death get alot to do with the drug cartel wey Naira marley dey run for him record label although nobody dun confirm any rumors to be true so na online speculation wey we just dey do with the whole matter but In all may his soul RIP.

comments.body: Mohbad death was  a shock thing to everybody someone as talented as he is and it wasn't even long he started his musical career is actually unfortunate that he had to leave this way, looking out the whole story about his death you will understand that there are so many mystery behind his death that are yet to unvail, truth be told our musical industry a lot are happening that we don't no about because mohba death was not the first time and even some persons claim he was killed using black magic while some claims he died as a result of depression, there has been so many views concerning his death but nobody really no what happened.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: I've been actively following up on this matter on both Twitter and Instagram, from all I've learnt so far, it's clear that the nigga didnt dies a natural death, he was murdered, and even before this murder took effect physically, he has been long murdered spiritually and emotionally, I really will not want to conclude on anything at the moment, but I think Naira Marley and Sam Larry (or what ever they are called) have serious questions to answer, including that nigga they call Zino or whatever, if only we live in a sane country, this niggas I mentioned are supposed to be in police custody by now because they are the prime suspects, but unfortunately, we live in a country where connection is like a god, once you are connected, you can do anything and get away with it ..May the soul of the young lad rest In peace, and I pray God himself fight for him .

comments.author: Spaceman1000$
comments.body: Omo normally enh, I no too Sabi this mohbad guy oh, but based on say the matter don dey trend for some days now. I come say make i try do my own critical observation online, because based on watin i dey see online, people's emotions are high and it could easily make a mob action taken towards some persons that have been fingered to be involved either in intimidating the young man or make him go into depression.Obviously mohbad has gotten issues with his record label, some close person's close to the record label said, it is cult related. That he has been asked to be initiated to a cult group by the owner of the record label, but he refused thereby causing a rift between himself(mohbad) and the owner of the record label, that has even lead to physical attack of mohbad.Another source said ,it could be drug related. So i later saw that the mohbad guy has really gotten himself involved with a lot of wrong person's that have been after his life for a long time coming.Whatever he must have done to those person's, his death can never a be reward for whatever they where asking from him. Justiceformohbad

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: Quote from: Hewlet on September 16, 2023, 10:38:19 PMWhat do you think about the whole story behind the death of our popular singer, mohbad? I feel with the numerous videos coming up lately, dude really went through a whole lot of physical and emotional trauma before his demise.See eh the whole entertainment industry is messed up both local and global. It is filled with a bunch of cliques, cults and many other evil things. Sorry to digress but what is happening with Mohbad is what what happened with Michael Jackson. Even though I am not a fan of Kanye, we heard him give up a glimpse of it when a video of  him pissing in one of his awards surfaced online. Once you get into the entertainment industry and join their cult, they make you famous and bring you the awards money, fame, women, that you can ever want. It is like selling your soul to the devil. And coming out is almost impossible. That's what I feel happened to the young man.QuoteIn a country were proper investigation Is taken seriously, the root course of his death should have started coming out by now, but you know this is Nigeria, everything just comes and goes away with time. It's a shame.These people own the police. No matter the evidence the public digs up, the Nigerian police will do nada.

comments.author: RockBell
comments.body: Quote from: Hewlet on September 16, 2023, 10:38:19 PMWhat do you think about the whole story behind the death of our popular singer, mohbad? In a country were proper investigation Is taken seriously, the root course of his death should have started coming out by now, but you know this is Nigeria, everything just comes and goes away with time. It's a shame. I was humbled for the first time in my life since my spirit had never been touched in the way that Mohbad's death had. I began by considering how meaningless existence is. Observing the entire process following his death. And most of the videos that came up showed how the boy was threatened and bullied, and I appreciate how people are fighting for him, but I don't like how his father is treating property. And, thank God, the police have made it public for the investigation, and those responsible for his bullying should face no more punishment. Something need to be corrected in the music industry. Some exposures are already happening music no be cult na.

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: This situation just looks like a conspiracy. How come he died immediately after the injection was given to him and why was he buried immediately even if he is a young man of that age.  It is very suspicious and pointing to few sets of people. The marlian records as he has said and his family. How can they be aware of his predicament and refused to do anything about it when they know he has challenges with his record label. It is unfortunate that our celebrities are just there doing a social media "justice for mohbad" without any actions just driving traffic for themselves. The Nigeria police too can not be trusted to do a proper investigation. If only they would not compromise, I believe justice would take it course and every one who is involved in his death would be brought to book.
